abstract: Marcel Kittel wins third stage of Giro d'Italia bicycle race to become overall leader.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; German Leads Giro d’Italia

snippet: With another superb performance, the German Marcel Kittel claimed a second successive sprint victory at the Giro d’Italia and replaced Tom Dumoulin as the overall leader.
lead_paragraph: With another superb performance, the German Marcel Kittel claimed a second successive sprint victory at the Giro d’Italia and replaced Tom Dumoulin as the overall leader.
